extendedInfo.description: Stay on top of local competition. Thousands of local merchants are using Perch to see whatâs happening with social media, promotions, reviews and online activity of other businesses nearby.â Winner: Best Business App â 2013 Appy Awards (MediaPost)â âThe One Stop Social Media Tracking App for Small Businessesâ â Small Biz Technologyâ âThis could become a standard app for all SMBs. â Marketinglandâ âMarket researchers everywhere can breathe a sigh of relief.â â MashableHereâs how Perch puts your business in the know:SAVE TIMEQuickly access the online presence for other nearby businesses across Facebook, Twitter, Yelp, Foursquare and hundreds of deal sites â all in one place.STAY AWAREKeep track of the activity that is most important to you by adding competitive businesses to your own private Watchlist, and set up optional email notifications so you never miss out.BE EFFECTIVE Find out how businesses like yours are reaching customers online â and see how your business compares â with access to real-time promotion, social and review updates.

reviews.title: My business
reviews.comment: This is a good tool to see how my online presence looks for many of my small businesses! Thanks. Very good idea. Continue to innovate and you will have for users.
reviews.author: Allan Yang

reviews.title: Makes life easier
reviews.comment: Using this app is much quicker than tracking down all the social profiles for local businesses I want to stay aware of. Now that the new release includes images, everything I need to see is showing up in one place.
reviews.author: Kendra Wiig

reviews.title: Very disappointing
reviews.comment: I was excited to install Perch as i had read about all the features. Once installed and account set-up, it has been nothing but problems. I cant even get past the log-in on my android as it spontaneously crashed every time. Even uninstalled and reinstalled but same issues. Developers need to work out bugs instead of rushing your app to market
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great tool for my business!
reviews.comment: Love how Perch let\'s me keep up with what\'s happening around my store.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app for consumers too!
reviews.comment: Just got a free coffee at Atlas Purveyors not realizing it was being offered while walking past their location earlier this morning.  And learned about free Sake at Sushi Zanmai! This list goes on.  How cool is that? Great job!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: It seems with it\'s lauch it is only covering the United States. It is a good idea with great potential, but is not available in South Africa - @Annerie_Els
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great idea
reviews.comment: I can see this app being pretty handy to small business owners.  Seems valuable to have an eye in the sky view of your competition with the app doing all the work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worthwhile app
reviews.comment: Pretty nice little app here.  Will be very beneficial to small biz. I can\'t someone rated this one star because it only covers the USA right now. It just freakin launched yesterday for crying out loud.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Perch is the perfect tool for learning about your local competition in the small business landscape. I can see exactly what my competition is doing on Twitter, Facebook, Foursquare while also staying in tune with what my clients are talking about and posting to sites like Yelp. Give me cutting edge information all in one place so as a small business owner, I have a leg up on my competition. Brilliant.
reviews.author: Ashley Kingsley

reviews.title: Great app for local discovery
reviews.comment: Great for learning how my competitors using social media and promoting themselves.
reviews.author: A Google User
